author: skitching
msg: Use thread-local for framework adapter location, set via a filter. Statics are not friendly for libraries.

author: ozeigermann
msg: Base functionality and tests in shape now. Javadocs still lacking completeness.

author: cdoremus
msg: Changed portlet2-api from JSR-286 specification rev 22 to rev 23 using portlet_api_change_rev22_to_rev23_081707.patch from PLUTO-415. Thank you Torsten!

author: dashorst
msg: Added Apache header to unit test

author: scheu
msg: Added a new class, MessageExternalizeUtils, to do the Message serialization portion
of MessageContext serialization.  The new MessageExternalizeUtils logic properly
serializes optimized attachments.  In additions it has a number of performance
improvements, improved debug trace and javadocs.
